statements: UPDATE candidate_screening SET screening_result = TRUE WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE candidate_screening SET candidate_name = 'Jane Doe', screening_criteria = '{"education": "Masters", "experience": "5 years"}' WHERE candidate_id = '98765432-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-1234567890ab';

UPDATE candidate_screening SET screening_criteria = '{"education": "Bachelor's degree"}', screening_result = TRUE WHERE candidate_name = 'Alice' AND candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE candidate_screening SET candidate_name = 'Bob', screening_result = FALSE WHERE screening_criteria->>'education' = 'Master's degree';
UPDATE candidate_criteria SET criteria_name = 'Experience', criteria_description = 'Updated criteria description' WHERE criteria_id = 1;
UPDATE candidate_application SET criteria_id = 2, candidate_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE candidate_id = 5;
UPDATE candidate_criteria SET criteria_description = 'Updated description' WHERE criteria_id = 1;
UPDATE candidate_application SET candidate_email = 'updated_email@example.com', criteria_id = 2 WHERE candidate_id = 5;
UPDATE candidate_criteria SET experience_years=3 WHERE candidate_name='John Doe';
UPDATE candidate_screening_results SET score=85, passed=true WHERE candidate_id=100 AND criteria_id=1;
UPDATE candidate_criteria SET experience_years = 5, skills = 'Python, SQL' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE screening_criteria SET weight = 0.75, criteria_description = 'Technical evaluation' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Candidates SET candidate_phone = '+1234567890' WHERE candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE CandidateFeedback SET feedback_rating = 5, feedback = 'Great candidate, highly recommended' WHERE candidate_id = 2;
UPDATE Candidates SET candidate_experience = 3 WHERE candidate_id = 5;
UPDATE CandidateFeedback SET feedback = 'Excellent' WHERE feedback_id = 3;
UPDATE Candidates SET experience_years = 3, current_job_title = 'Senior Developer' WHERE candidate_id = '5f880685-1f5e-4c46-8cd0-4b0f92d5226a';
UPDATE CandidateAssessments SET score = 85 WHERE assessment_id = 123;
UPDATE Candidates SET current_job_title = 'Senior Software Engineer', experience_years = 5 WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE InterviewFeedback SET overall_rating = 4, feedback_text = 'Great communication skills', interviewer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174009';
